item.title: Venezuela live updates: Machado says Trump deserves Nobel Peace Prize
item.description: The president of Venezuela was taken by American forces and transported to the U.S. Saturday to face federal drug charges.

item.title: WATCH: 2 hikers saved from edge of steep cliff in California
item.description: A paramedic helped the women move to a safer location on the rocks, and then onto the chopper.

item.title: Swiss bar where fatal New Year's fire broke out had last safety inspection in 2019
item.description: Local authorities say fire safety inspections hadn’t been carried out for several years at the bar where a fire that broke out at a New Year’s party l...

item.title: Epstein files: 2 million records in various stages of review, DOJ says
item.description: The DOJ said that there are more than 2 million documents “potentially responsive” to the Epstein Files Transparency Act that are presently in various...

item.title: WATCH: Deer with bag stuck on head gets a little help from friendly commuter
item.description: A man on his way to work in the Florida Keys pulled over to help a deer that got its head trapped in a bag.
